verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, Thou Fount of ev'ry blessing, tune my heart to sing Thy grace; streams of mercy, never ceasing, call for songs of loudest praise. Teach me some melodious sonnet, sung by flaming tongues above. Praise the mount--I'm fixed upon it- mount of God's unchanging love.
